properties.displayName: Office 365 Mailbox Rule Forwarding To External Address - [WC-BASE]
properties.description: This alert rule will query the OfficeActivity table to find any events where a Mailbox Forwarding Rule has been enabled and the recieving email is not an address within the company. This may indicate a exfiltration attempt on a users mailbox.
properties.query:
let GetTenantDomain= 
    EmailEvents
    | where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
    | extend TenantDomain = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, "@", 1).[0])
    | summarize count() by TenantDomain
    | order by count_ desc 
    | take 5
    | project TenantDomain;
OfficeActivity
| where Operation in ('New-InboxRule', 'Set-Mailbox', 'Set-InboxRule', 'Enable-InboxRule')
| extend details = parse_json(Parameters)
| where details contains 'ForwardTo' or details contains 'RedirectTo'
| extend ForwardTo = iif(
                         details[0].Name contains 'ForwardTo',
                         details[0].Value,
                         iif(
    details[1].Name contains 'ForwardTo',
    details[1].Value,
    iif(
    details[2].Name contains 'ForwardTo',
    details[2].Value,
    iif(
    details[3].Name contains 'ForwardTo',
    details[3].Value,
    iif(
    details[4].Name contains 'ForwardTo',
    details[4].Value,
    ''
)
)
)
)
                     )
| extend RedirectTo = iif(
                          details[0].Name contains 'RedirectTo',
                          details[0].Value,
                          iif(
    details[1].Name contains 'RedirectTo',
    details[1].Value,
    iif(
    details[2].Name contains 'RedirectTo',
    details[2].Value,
    iif(
    details[3].Name contains 'RedirectTo',
    details[3].Value,
    iif(
    details[4].Name contains 'RedirectTo',
    details[4].Value,
    ''
)
)
)
)
                      )
| extend RuleName = iif(
                        details[3].Name contains 'Name',
                        details[3].Value,
                        iif(
    details[4].Name contains 'Name',
    details[4].Value,
    iif(
    details[5].Name contains 'name',
    details[5].Value,
    'Check Parameters'
)
)
                    )
| extend RuleParameters = iif(
                              details[2].Name != 'ForwardTo' and details[2].Name != 'RedirectTo',
                              strcat(tostring(details[2].Name), '-', tostring(details[2].Value)),
                              iif(
    details[3].Name != 'ForwardTo' and details[3].Name != 'RedirectTo' and details[3].Name != 'Name',
    strcat(tostring(details[3].Name), '-', tostring(details[3].Value)),
    iff(
    details[4].Name != 'ForwardTo' and details[4].Name != 'RedirectTo' and details[4].Name != 'Name' and details[4].Name != 'StopProcessingRules',
    strcat(tostring(details[4].Name), '-', tostring(details[4].Value)),
    'All Mail'
)
)
                          )
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Operation,
    RuleName,
    RuleParameters,
    iif(details contains 'ForwardTo', ForwardTo, RedirectTo),
    ClientIP,
    UserId,
    details
| project-rename Email_Forwarded_To = Column1, Creating_User = UserId
| extend EmailRecipients = split(Email_Forwarded_To,";")
| mv-expand EmailRecipients
| extend Domain = split(EmailRecipients,"@").[1]
| where isnotempty( Domain)
| where not( Domain in (GetTenantDomain))
